state_description: This screen allows users to manage various types of extensions on their Mac, such as Spotlight Plugins, Safari Extensions, Preference Panes, and Internet Plugins. The current view shows that there are no Spotlight Plugins to clean or fix.
done: Checked Spotlight Plugins for issues or items to clean.
